Html: I'm very new to code and have been asked to create a desktop app for windows 7 to manage data such as employees, materials, labor and such. I have limited coding experience in java. I want to do it in a good looking manner and modern UI seems like the perfect tool however I do not know how to get started. I went through the tutorial but how do I keep going forware i.e. adding a button? I got one added but can't get it to go to the place where I want. I also wanted to know if it would be possible to connect this to a database such as mysql? Thanks for the help!
Look about SQL Compact Edition and Model-View-ViewModel pattern.
